website_summaries.verdict: An adorable little ride-on that’s styled on a police patrol car. Offers realistic details that will delight little law enforcement officers and convenient adaptability that will grow with your child for years of use.
pros: Lifelike patrol car details make for convincing and imaginative play
Canopy with integrated push handle provides shade on sunny days
Quiet ride wheels reduce noise when riding on hard surfaces
Extra castor wheel for effortless steering
Removable floorboard allows for kid-powered use as little ones grow
cons: Some parents say the push handle is awkwardly short

customer_reviews.title: Great Car...with one flaw....
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely cute little car and my little one loves it. The only issue I have is that for the parent, it can be a tough pushing it because the bar is so low (top of the car). I'm 5' 5" and the top of the car is almost too short for me to push. The first time I took my little one out I ended up with a bruise on my hand just from the odd angle that I had to push from. I would not recommend this if you are tall and will be pushing your toddler. Otherwise, it is a great car.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing-steering  wheel does not control wheels
customer_reviews.text: Totally disappointed. After putting this together we realized that contrary to what other purchasers told us the steering wheel does NOT turn the wheels on the car. Totally frustrating for the kids who are trying to make the car turn.
customer_reviews.author: MonB

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend it for someone without building skills
customer_reviews.text: Assembly is complex with close to 40 parts and an instruction manual with 75 steps with only pictures and virtually no written instructions. The box states that all you need to assemble this coupe is a hammer, screwdriver and socket wrench. There is no way to place any of the screws without an electric drill. Half the openings for parts to fit into holes do not fit. The coupe also came with multiple scratches on the body. It took a very mechanically oriented individual 3 hours to assemble this. I would not recommend it for someone without building skills.
customer_reviews.author: WGB

customer_reviews.title: Steering wheel does not turn the front wheels
customer_reviews.text: Caster wheels makes it easier for the person pushing the car to make turns.Steering wheel does not turn the front wheels. No seat belts.
customer_reviews.author: Mikee

customer_reviews.title: Grandbaby LOVES IT
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our grandson on his first birthday. It was very easy to assemble, just take your time with the stickers. He is crazy about this toy! His parents love it because it doubles as a stroller with an handle that makes it easy to push around. I love the fact that the bottom is removeable so that he can Fred Flinstone around in it now that he's a little older.
customer_reviews.author: Missycoo

customer_reviews.title: Wish we opened the box before xmas eve
customer_reviews.text: Car came with damage on the front. Didnt notice until we were assembling it on Christmas eve so we were kinda stuck. If you buy open and look at prior to needing it to gift to a child
customer_reviews.author: Sammie Pickles

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Not as tall as I hope to push for a adult and in 5'8". Hard to steer at times. But my twins love it! For it for the first Birthday. Easy for them to get in and out on their own, they push eachother in it and they love the horn. Over all I'm happy if their happy.
customer_reviews.author: Parent of 3

customer_reviews.title: And the push handle is great for walks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson to have at my house when he visits and he just loves it! He likes to go for walks in the neighborhood while riding. And the push handle is great for walks.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I thought it would be - but overall ok
customer_reviews.author: SHAWN FLORES

customer_reviews.title: My great grandson love it and very steady so he want ...
customer_reviews.text: My great grandson love it and very steady so he want fall over and he thinks he is the police
customer_reviews.author: Sharon W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grand children love it. It was easy to assemble, only taking about 15 minutes to put together.
customer_reviews.author: D&J

customer_reviews.title: Stickers missing
customer_reviews.text: 1yo son LOVES it, but it arrived without ANY of the stickers.
customer_reviews.author: COdadurday

product_meta.title: Step2 Turbo Coupe Interceptor Ride On Police Car, White
product_meta.description: Junior police officers will be able to patrol and protect the neighborhood streets with the do-it-all Turbo Coupe Interceptor by Step2. This kid's patrol car features the realistic styling of law enforcement vehicles today. Parents will be able to push their little officers around with ease by using the built-in parent push handle. Don't let the robbers get away by stopping and turning on a dime with the easy-turn, 360-degree castor wheel. This kid’s police car will be the perfect ride-on for your little ones! Made in USA of U.S. and imported parts.
feature_bullets: Realistic sports car style meets police patrol in this police-themed buggy for kids! They’ll enjoy this police car ride-on toy for years to come with the removable floorboard to convert this ride-on to a foot-to-floor car kids can control on their own.
A 360-degree castor wheel allows you to quickly turn during high-speed police chases, while the working horn alerts neighbors of the patrol’s presence.
Kids’ police car ride-on toy features a canopy with built-in handle for adults to push during patrol, as well as Whisper Ride Wheels to quiet road noise.
Working door opens and closes with a secure lock, and molded-in cup holders let mini troopers store the essential drinks and accessories while on the job.
In the box: Interceptor base with decals and door lock, wheels, steering wheel and horn, and removable floorboard.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars32 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
